thread.section_title: Modern Bath House Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Modern Bath House | modernbathhouse.com
thread.title: Helene Stone
thread.title_full: Modern Bath House reviewed by Helene Stone

author: Helene Stone
title: Helene Stone
text: Was very pleased with the sales support when I ordered my vanity. I hadn't gotten a call from the freight company regarding delivery. I called MBH and they took care of it immediately. Received my item and it was just as pictured. Loved it. Would recommend MBH for their excellent customer service and for their great prices.
